prompts.name_generation: Generate a concise, creative English project folder name (max 100 characters, use underscores for spaces) based on the image. Do NOT mention specific colors, brands, or product names. The name should combine: main object, scene/solid background, lighting (light/dark/etc), angle (top/isometric/etc), dominant material (wood/metal/concrete/etc), and shoot style (floating/top view/isometric/etc). Do NOT use numbering or step-by-step answers. Only return the final folder name, e.g. Modern_Floating_Chair_TopView_Metallic_Scene. No explanation, just the name.
